title: Google Takes a Bite out of Apple with iPhone-Friendly Cell Service
description:
Today is Friday, December 7, and we’re looking at Google Fi vs. Verizon & AT&T.


See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
